name: MQTT Transport
description: Connect or disconnect to an MQTT broker.

inputParameters.name: host
inputParameters.description: The host address of the MQTT broker. Defaults to 127.0.0.1.

inputParameters.name: port
inputParameters.description: The port of MQTT broker. Defaults to 1883.

inputParameters.name: connect
inputParameters.description: If True, connects to MQTT broker. If False, disconnects from MQTT. Defaults to False.
